name: BridgeLink
description:
Description

Developed for the GPC Mechanics Jam from October 1st-2nd, based around the "link" theme of the three given. The game is a showcase of a mechanic we developed and is not a complete game.

The mechanic revolves around shooting two nodes, one coloured yellow and one coloured blue. When both are active, they create a beam of energy that can be used as a platform for greater movement. An additional mechanic is included where connecting both nodes to special platforms will have them move towards each other while they are active.

Download and run the executable version for the intended build.  We used VFX Graph for the shaders and then learned that WebGL does not support them. The WebGL version uses an older variant of the nodes without the visual effects for those who do not wish to download the executable.

Controls

WASD to move

Space Bar to jump

Left mouse to shoot the left (yellow) node

Right mouse to shoot the right (blue) node

Middle mouse to reset the nodes

Enter to reset the scene

Escape (in the PC version) to quit the game
